hero.subtitle: Create stunning wishlists for any occasion. Share with friends and family. Never receive duplicate gifts again.

description.line1: Public web interface for viewing wishlists.

notFound.title: Wishlist Not Found
notFound.description: This wishlist doesn't exist or is no longer public.

filters.noResults: No gifts match your current filters.

dialog.description: Enter your name to reserve this gift. Email is optional.
dialog.emailHint: If you register later, we'll use this email to link your existing reservations to your account

validation.nameTooLong: Name must be less than 255 characters

errors.alreadyReserved: This item has already been reserved. The list will refresh.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
